H1.text: who won the oscar for best actor in 1975. Al Pacino

H2.text: who won the oscar for best actor in 1975. Robert De Niro

H3.text: who won the oscar for best actor in 1975. Art Carney

A4.text: Carney won the Academy Award for Best Actor for his 1974 performance as Harry Coombes, an elderly man going on the road with his pet cat, in Harry and Tonto.

A5.text: Other nominees that year were Albert Finney, Dustin Hoffman, Jack Nicholson, and Al Pacino.
